moves.name: Overheat
moves.effect: Sharply lowers the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.effect: The user gets ready to attack. Using this move again will cause the user to attack. No other actions can be taken while ready to attack. The preparation period is skipped if the weather is sunny, and the user can attack right away.

moves.name: I’ll Show You!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s evasiveness and critical-hit rate. These stats are sharply raised when the weather is sunny.

moves.name: Sacred Fire
moves.effect: Removes the frozen condition from the user. Has a good chance of leaving the target burned.

passives.name: Charging Sun 6
passives.description: Powers up moves when the weather is sunny.

passives.name: Speeding Sun 2
passives.description: Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is sunny.

passives.name: Solarize
passives.description: Makes the weather sunny after using a sync move.
